metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17560 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description: The "Apache NetBeans" autoupdate system does not validate SSL certificatesand hostnames for https based downloads. This allows an attacker tointercept downloads of autoupdates and modify the download, potentiallyinjecting malicious code. â€œApache NetBeans" versions up to and including11.2 are affected by this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: netbeans package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
